brief:
Update the calculator application with these new features:

1. Add a history panel showing the last 5 calculations
2. Add memory functions: M+, M-, MR (Memory Recall), MC (Memory Clear)
3. Add scientific functions: sin, cos, tan, sqrt, xÂ²
4. Add parentheses support for complex calculations
5. Add a dark/light theme toggle switch
6. Improve the layout to accommodate new buttons
7. Add keyboard shortcuts help panel
8. Store calculation history in localStorage

Keep all existing functionality while adding these enhancements. The design should remain clean and professional.
checks: Must maintain all previous calculator functions
Must have history panel with last 5 calculations
Must have memory buttons (M+, M-, MR, MC)
